data.message: 1 death in America from Ebola and Facebook wants to get involved.  400 Americans will die TODAY from lung cancer, the biggest cancer killer in America and in the middle of Lung Cancer Awareness month you want to push Ebola into the spotlight?  Lung Cancer is the #1 cancer killer in the WORLD and in America gets the smallest share of Federal funding for research yet kills more than the next 4 cancers combined.  Maybe that's where your social network should be looking and not at an overhyped media driven let's scare everyone disease named Ebola!  #LCAM14

replies.message: Funny that this comment didn't get a reply from the great and powerful FB, but other comments about inane issues did.
